data.value: Mysterious Ninja
Shinra Trooper
Kunsel
You must be the anti-SOLDIER\nmonsters I've been hearing about.
SOLDIER: Second Class Zack,\nvictorious once again!
Director Lazard,\nare you watching?
What the hell is this!?\nC'mon, let's get rid of this thing!
I guess it's not a picky eater.
I'd rather not be devoured by a monster today, thanks.
There's no way out. Surrender!
Guess I have no choice.
Reno!\nWant him taken out?
I don't care. Just grab her.
Man, they just keep coming!
Show me you deserve to be a First.
You're on!\nGet ready to pick your jaw up off the floor!
Show me what a future hero can do!
You got it!
I've never seen anything like them before.\nMan, if only Matt were here.\nHe'd know what they were.
Who cares? Just focus on the battle!
I hate it when the garbage parties up.\nReminds me too much of us.
Then we're probably in for a good fight.\nDon't let your guard down.
Again...?
Do your worst!
Glenn, we won't last at this rate.\nWe'll expend our recovery measures before long.
It's not like we're fighting behemoths!\nThese guys are nothing!
Let's get this over with!
Come on! Focus!
Right back at ya!
A summon?\nWho called it out?
No one gets in the way\nof Reno and the Turks...
Hey, didn't we already deal with this guy?
It must've regenerated...
Then we defeat it again! As many times as it takes!
I see.\nWe won't be allies, then.
Time's up.
A summon!?\nSo that's how it is, huh!
Uh...
If we die before we complete our mission,\nwe're gonna regret it 200% more than if\nwe had died under normal circumstances.
We won't have any regrets. We'll be dead.
He's right! If we die, we'll be no better than\nall the other disposable P0 SOLDIERs!
Hey, it's Stamp! Boy, you're gonna wish\nyou never saw me again!
That's likely the most powerful weapon\nin their arsenal.
It's an old model, so much so that it's not\nin my records. We'll have to improvise.
Hahaha! Yes!
I hope that's the end of that.
Is that...Stamp!?
He's huge...! Is that because of the mako!?
Dammit, how many times do we have to fight\nthis thing!? Guys, let's finish him for good!
If you want it back, you'll have to\npry it from my cold, dead hands!
Hey, are you listening to me!?
Whatever...
One more time! Let's go one more time!
What's the matter?\nScared, are ya?
Whatever...
It's hard to put it into words, so why don't\nwe show you what we mean instead?
We got company.
I've never seen monsters like these before.
It doesn't matter.\nWe take down whatever's in our way.
I hope Sephiroth's alright.
They look pretty angry!
Must be the mako!
We're running out of time.\nLet's do this quickly.
There's more over there!
Look out! Incoming!
Urg!
What theâ€”?
It must be a product of the island's raging\nmako... Or is it the will of the planet...?
Who cares!? As long as it stays the hell out\nof our way!
You think you can do whatever you want!?\nCome on! Bring it!
I don't have time for this!
Get lost, will ya?
I don't like being taken for a fool.
You're not taking another step.
I'm outta here!
I'll report to Tseng!
You're dealing with us now!
We'll take this codger down together!\nTime for teamwork, Sephiroth!
Do whatever you want.
Haven't seen any beasts like this before...\nThey look as vicious as the environment\nthey're in.
If they're in our way, then we cut them down.
Easier said than done, I see.
Welcome wagon, huh?\nThen let me introduce myself!
Where the hell'd you come from?
An Angeal monster!?
I'm coming for you as soon as I'm done!
I'll handle this. Get back.
Maybe if you had asked nicely. But no dice!
